body:
Pls translate 
[diletta (もり苔)] 本当は好きって言いたかった
 into Chinese thx
I wonder if it was female 🤔 maby if I'd given it something I could of befriended it and eventually had some half goblin kids that would of been cool haha, shame I only saw it once.
And it was super late in a place where you never see any people at night so I'm certain it wasn't some kind of weird prank by a midget or anything.

I saw a goblin once really late at night on a backroad outside my village, it was dark and I didn't have a light so I couldn't make out any details well but it was about 3-4 feet tall didn't have any  clothes on was dark in color and had from what I could make out roughly the same proportions as a human. It wasn't scared of me either it just stood abut 15 meters away watching me then walked away without making any sound. I wasn't drunk or high and this isn't a joke this happened about 2 years ago, there is no way it could of been a human it's skin was too dark and it was too muscular to be a kid.
The flat girl is so perfect
i wish i was the flat one
i wonder why is no english translator taking this. this looks really good tho
